AD.name: Max Cache Size
AD.description: The maximum amount of Endeca responses to cache before invalidating the oldest entries.

AD.name: Max Cache Duration
AD.description: Seconds that a cached Endeca response will stay valid.

AD.name: Max Connections
AD.description: Defines the maximum number of connections allowed overall. This value only applies to the number of connections from a particular instance of HttpConnectionManager.

AD.name: Max Host Connections
AD.description: Defines maximum number of connections allowed per host configuration. (Values only apply to the number of connections from a particular instance of HttpConnectionManager.)

AD.name: Global SKU Page Path
AD.description: Defines the global SKU page path. Redirect here if product is not sellable in current cookie language, or if language cookie not available and product is sold globally.
